name: Joslin Maria Thomas
label: Data Scientist
summary: Data Scientist with experience in renewable energy and insurance industries

highlights: Maintained and enhanced existing deep learning-based anomaly detection models analyzing SCADA time-series data from various turbines, improving fault detection precision by 15 percent.
Optimized model performance through hyperparameter tuning, feature engineering, and model retraining using historical SCADA datasets.
Developed an end-to-end reinforcement learning (RL) optimization framework for turbine yaw control, achieving predictive power yield improvements of up to 4 percent via wake steering strategies.
Engineered custom prompt templates and retrieval strategies to extract key operational insights from large-scale turbine logs, reducing troubleshooting time for clients by 50 percent.
Delivered monthly AI research presentations to the Data Science team, enhancing technical knowledge sharing and fostering a culture of continuous learning.
Developed internal tools using R to analyse risks of investments in alternative assets like solar energy, wind energy.
Performed quantitative analysis and research for the calibration of risk models, utilizing time-series-based methodologies in R.
Led data analysis for Solvency II SCR (Solvency Capital Requirement) modeling, applying statistical techniques to optimize capital allocation and support regulatory compliance.
Identified and modeled key risk drivers (e.g., underwriting, market risk) using data-driven approaches to inform strategic risk mitigation efforts.
Streamlined reporting by designing interactive dashboards for capital requirement monitoring, improving operational efficiency and visibility for stakeholders.
Mentored two junior analysts, improving team productivity by 20 percent over six months.
Conducted exploratory data analysis (EDA) on insurance claims to uncover actionable insights, enabling strategic planning for pricing and operations.
Built statistical models to detect and monitor claims inflation trends, facilitating proactive financial planning and rate adjustments.
Calibrated insurance risk parameters, enhancing the accuracy of predictive models used for strategic planning and capital management.
Designed and implemented automated data visualization tools using Python and Excel to communicate KPIs, enabling data-driven insights across business units.
Presented data-driven findings on claims trends to senior leadership and board members.
Analyzed the impact of rate changes, helping stakeholders make informed decisions to optimize profitability.
Assisted in model validation using R, ensuring robustness and reliability of actuarial models before deployment.
